function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of the impact of built environment on mental health","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and individual well-being","Mitigation":"Conducting more comprehensive and diverse research on the relationship between built environment and mental health","Technologies":"Research methodologies and data analysis tools","People":"General public, individuals in healthcare and working facilities","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited evidence and diverse research findings","Impact":"Inability to draw clear conclusions and guidelines for built environment design","Mitigation":"Encouraging more empirical research and standardizing methodologies","Technologies":"Empirical research tools and standardized data collection methods","People":"Architects, urban planners, and public health organizations","Owner":"Research institutions and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in healthcare and working facilities","Impact":"Risk of outbreak and spread of diseases among occupants","Mitigation":"Implementing infection control measures, ventilation systems, and sanitation protocols","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, UV disinfection units, and smart sanitation technologies","People":"Occupants of healthcare and working facilities","Owner":"Facility management, public health organizations"}]}
